channel.title: Thug fighter + banker
channel.description: I need thug fighter that fights thugs, eats when needed and gets more food from edge bank if runs out. It would be nice if script had working antirandoms and good antiban. Im willing to pay up to 1.5m rs cash depending how good its working.

item.title: Thug fighter + banker
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Thats fine, I’m not sure how long mine will take or how well it will work, so go ahead. If he’s going to pay for it he deserves the better script, so if we both make one, he can choose.

Read full topic

item.title: Thug fighter + banker
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I just started to make one today for that shed north of the bank, unknowingly that weibs has decided to do it. But im just making mine for fun and to level my WC up to level 40.

Read full topic

item.title: Thug fighter + banker
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I think I’ve seen a thug fighter somewhere before, but not one that banks. I’m thinking of making a auto-fighter sometime soon, but it would take a while to fit your requirements. I’m not saying I’ll do it, but if I finish soon enough and you still need one you could certaintly buy it.

-Weibs.

EDIT: I’ve decided to take up the challenge. I’ve got a few questions.

Where are there thugs in Edgeville?

What foods are you going to want it to eat? All types?

Do you want it to switch players? For example, if one of your players gets stuck in a random that can’t be solved, would you like it to switch to a different player? Or just stop the script?

Any other details would be nice,

-Weibs.

EDIT2: I just checked out edgeville, there’s no thugs, not even in the dungeon. Do you mean the men in that shed just north of the edge bank?

Read full topic

item.title: Thug fighter + banker

@Cheatest wrote:

there is thugz in edge?
